entry.title: Reply to https://jamesg.blog/2023/04/18/source-code-folder-names/
entry.summary: I've seen some people use either ~/code, ~/projects, or ~/programming. The first IDE I used was Eclipse and by default it would create projects under ~/workspace. Since then I've been using that as my source code directory but also...
entry.content: I've seen some people use either ~/code, ~/projects, or ~/programming. The first IDE I used was Eclipse and by default it would create projects under ~/workspace. Since then I've been using that as my source code directory but also because its a small reference to Hackers (1995).
